content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <OpenSearchDescription xmlns="http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/"                         xmlns:time="http://a9.com/-/opensearch/extensions/time/1.0/"                        xmlns:geo="http://a9.com/-/opensearch/extensions/geo/1.0/"  > <!--     OpenSearch description document for nsidc.org.      Copyright (c) 2011 National Snow and Ice Data Center. All rights reserved.     -->         <!-- Administrative Details -->   <ShortName>NSIDC Service</ShortName>   <LongName>data set level OpenSearch interface for nsidc.org</LongName>   <Description>This is the opensearch description document that describes how to query our server for data set level information.</Description>   <Tags>nsidc.org opensearch search data set geospatial temporal parameter</Tags>   <Contact>nsidc@nsidc.org</Contact>      <!-- Images -->   <Image width="16" height="16" type="image/jpeg">http://nsidc.org/favicon.ico</Image>   <Image width="76" height="60" type="image/jpeg">http://nsidc.org/images/logo_nsidc_76x60.jpg</Image>    <!-- URL Template for refreshing this file -->   <Url type="application/opensearchdescription+xml"        rel="self"        template="http://nsidc.org/api/opensearch/1.1/dataset/description"/>     <!-- URL Templates for ATOM results Data Set level search -->   <!-- via Polygon geometry -->   <Url type="text/atom+xml"        rel="results"        indexOffset="0"        template="http://nsidc.org/api/opensearch/1.1/dataset?searchterms={searchTerms?}&loc={geo:polygon?}&dtstart={time:start?}&dtend={time:end?}&startIndex={startIndex?}&itemsPerPage={count?}"/>    <!-- via Bounding Box  -->   <Url type="text/atom+xml"        rel="results"        indexOffset="0"        template="http://nsidc.org/api/opensearch/1.1/dataset?searchterms={searchTerms?}&bbox={geo:box?}&dtstart={time:start?}&dtend={time:end?}&startIndex={startIndex?}&itemsPerPage={count?}"/>           <!-- via Instrument -->   <Url type="text/atom+xml"        rel="results"        indexOffset="1"        pageOffset="1"        template="http://nsidc.org/api/opensearch/1.1/dataset?instrumentId={nsidc:instrumentId}"/>           <!-- expands Online Resource URLs based on information from related dataset and measurement -->   <Url type="text/atom+xml"        rel="results"        indexOffset="1"        pageOffset="1"        template="http://nsidc.org/api/opensearch/1.1/dataset?relatedDataset={nsidc:authoritativeId}&relatedMeasurement={nsidc:measurementId}"/>           <!-- for a single Dataset -->   <Url type="text/atom+xml"        rel="results"        indexOffset="1"        pageOffset="1"        template="http://nsidc.org/api/opensearch/1.1/dataset/{nsidc:authoritativeId}/"/>       <!-- Example Queries -->   <Query role="example" searchterms="Air Temperature" />   <Query role="example" searchterms="Brightness Temperature" dtstart="2000-01-01T00:00:00Z" dtend="2000-01-31T23:59:59Z" />   <Query role="example" searchterms="albedo" loc="10,100,20,100,20,110,10,110,10,100" dtstart="2009-12-24T00:00:00Z" dtend="2009-12-31T00:00:00Z" />   <Query role="example" bbox="100,10,110,20" dtstart="2009-12-24T00:00:00Z" dtend="2009-12-31T00:00:00Z" />   <Query role="example" instrumentId="21" />   <Query role="example" instrumentId="21" relatedDataset="IFLTRPT" relatedMeasurement="2556529" />      <!-- Control Params -->   <Language>en-us</Language>   <OutputEncoding>UTF-8</OutputEncoding>   <InputEncoding>UTF-8</InputEncoding>   <SyndicationRight>open</SyndicationRight>   <AdultContent>false</AdultContent>   <Attribution>© 2011 National Snow and Ice Data Center.</Attribution> </OpenSearchDescription>
